description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 8 BALL is a 3D casual pool game focusing on 8-ball gameplay with high quality visual appearance and wide range of customization.  Player is given a stylish pool table with sizes customizable among 6 foot, 7 foot, 8 foot and 9 foot. The bed color is available in 6 colors. The game also offers yellow/red balls with options to apply national flags to them.
description.short: 8 BALL is a 3D casual pool game focusing on 8-ball gameplay with high quality visual appearance and wide range of customization. The game also offers yellow/red balls with options to apply national flags to them.
